amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal permanent law from the Agriculture Act of 1949 that pertains to dairy support.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to repeal permanent law from the Agriculture Act of 1949 that pertains to dairy support. Prevents the currently suspended law from becoming reactivated should Congress not reauthorize programs under the Department of Agriculture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 309 (Roll no. 258).
